title: 161: Bekah’s 2nd Birth Story: Franklin James
itunes:title: 161: Bekah’s 2nd Birth Story: Franklin James
description:
It’s that time, Broads! Bekah and Jess chat all about the birth of Bekah and Grayston’s second child, Franklin James. She tells us all about what her initial birth plan was, comparisons to Ruth’s birth, some shocking new experiences, her labor and delivery, and how her and baby Franklin are doing! 
CLICK HERE TO DONATE TO OUR DONATION MATCH GOFUNDME TO “SUPPORT BLACK BIRTH WORKERS”: https://gf.me/u/yc22b9
***Broads, join us for the season recap of Jojo’s season this Thursday, July 2nd! 
ALSO, THE BROADS WILL BE BACK TO DROPPING TWO NEW EPISODES PER WEEK TOGETHER STARTING NEXT WEEK - JULY 7th & 9th! Chat soon xx
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS: 
*** ETTITUDE: Get 20% off your set of Ettitude sheets (and FREE shipping) by texting Chat to 64-000
*** CANDID: For a limited time, you can get started with $75 off by using code CHATTY at Candidco.com/CHATTY
*** ISSUU: Go to ISSUU.INFO/​CHATTY ​to sign up for your FREE account.
 *** MAGIC SPOON: Go to magicspoon.com/chatty to grab a variety pack and try it today! And be sure to use our promo code CHATTY at checkout to ​get free shipping!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
